description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in mojoomla WPCRM - CRM for Contact form CF7 & WooCommerce allows Reflected XSS. This issue affects WPCRM - CRM for Contact form CF7 & WooCommerce: from n/a through 3.2.0.

product.name: WPCRM - CRM for Contact form CF7 & WooCommerce
